glosses: in the appropriate time, in good time
once, formerly, some time in the past
once upon a time, a long time ago
synonyms: evvel zaman içinde, kalbur saman içinde

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish وقتیله (vaḳtiyle), from وقت (vaḳt, vaḳit), equivalent to vakit (“time”) + -i (possessive suffix) + -yla (instrumental suffix).
